title: Create a data transfer configuration
description: Creates a transfer configuration in the BigQuery Data Transfer Service to schedule recurring data transfers from a supported data source into a BigQuery dataset.

objective.narrative: Automate data ingestion into BigQuery by creating a transfer configuration. This resource defines the data source, destination dataset, and schedule for a recurring data transfer job.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatatransfer_v1_datatransferservice_transferconfig_create
regionTags.title: Create a data transfer configuration
regionTags.description: Creates a transfer configuration in the BigQuery Data Transfer Service to schedule recurring data transfers from a supported data source into a BigQuery dataset.
